LanguageData.Bullet_Velvet_Camera.label: Velvet_Camera bullet
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.label: Anesidora
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.description: Anesidora is a camera belonging to Velvet Scarlatina which acts as her primary weapon. It is capable of creating solid "light copies" of any weapon Velvet has photographed using Hard-Light Dust, which she can then use in battle.
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera.tools.1.label: front
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.label: Anesidora
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.description: Anesidora is a camera belonging to Velvet Scarlatina which acts as her primary weapon. It is capable of creating solid "light copies" of any weapon Velvet has photographed using Hard-Light Dust, which she can then use in battle.
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.RWBY_Velvet_Camera_Box.tools.1.label: front
